ru.jango.j0loader.param

Class Param

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.jango.j0loader.param.Param
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitmapParam, DataParam, StringParam

    public class Param
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for managing HTTP request params. You can use this class and it's subclasses to construct and manipulate HTTP-entities that you need. All aspects (including ContentType) could be configured as you need.

    If you want a Param-like wrapper (like BitmapParam) for some complicated structure (like Bitmap), it's a good idea to subclass Param.

      Transforms this Param into an HTTP-entity of full value - adds all needed headers and boundaries before and after and transforms all this into a byte array.
